SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.BedGraphOu.description: Whether to add BedGraphOutput to controlFREEC outputs, recommended value set in the template

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.SNPfile.description: Vcf file holding locations of the common variants to calculate pileup statistics on

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.base_file_.description: Base file name used for some output files

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.chrLenFile.description: Chromosome lengths file focusing controlFREEC regions. file is expected to be tab-delimited where the first column indicates the chromosome name and the second column indicates the chromosome length. By default, the reference.fai file will be used.

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.collect_co.description: Genomic region to limit the CNV calling to

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.contaminat.description: Whether to run controlFREEC with contaminationAdjustment option, recommended value set in the template
a priori known value of tumor sample contamination by normal cells. Default: contamination=0

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.degree.description: Degree of polynomial for GC normalization. Default is 3

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.gemMappabi.description: Gem file holding mappablity biased regions.

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.genome_win.description: Bed file of the genome binned to equal sized windows

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.inputForma.description: controlFREEC input format, recommended value set in the template

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.intersecti.description: Intersection cutoff with UG-CNV-LCR regions to filter out CNV calls. Default is  0.5

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.interval_l.description: Interval list defining the regions to gather allele frequencies on, recommended value set in the template

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.mapq_overr.description: Reads mapping-quality cutoff for coverage calculation. Default is 1

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.maxThreads.description: maximal threads for controlFREEC. Default is 8

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.min_cnv_le.description: Minimum length for reported CNVs. Default is 10,000

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.normal_cov.description: Pre-calculated binned coverage for the normal sample in the format needed for controlFREEC (cpn)

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.normal_sor.description: Pre-calculated bedGraph files containing per-base coverage for the normal sample

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.references.description: Struct of reference objects holding reference fasta with corresponding fai and dict files

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.scatter_in.description: Breaks for scatter interval list, see template for the default

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.sex.description: Sample's sex value, should be 'XX' or 'XY'

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.tumor_cove.description: Pre-calculated binned coverage for the tumor sample in the format needed for controlFREEC (cpn)

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.tumor_sort.description: Pre-calculated bedGraph files containing per-base coverage for the tumor sample

SomaticCNVCallingControlFREEC.window.description: The size of the window over which the coverage is aggregated
